titles.title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to modify the composition of the Eastern judicial district of Arkansas, and for other purposes.
Divisional Realignment for the Eastern District of Arkansas Act of 2018
Divisional Realignment for the Eastern District of Arkansas Act of 2018
Divisional Realignment for the Eastern District of Arkansas Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary:
Divisional Realignment for the Eastern District of Arkansas Act of 2018
This bill amends the federal judicial code to consolidate the five existing divisions in the Eastern District of Arkansas into three divisions.
